name: A Dark Winter's Walk
description:
Merry Christmas to one and all! This story game will take you down a dark road many face even at Christmas. It's dark, maybe a bit creepy, and depending on your choices, you will experience different parts of the story.  In order to fully benefit from what this simple game has to offer, please pull up a nice comfortable chair, put on your headset with your volume turned up to a comfortable level (no jumpscares), and enjoy a nice big cup of hot cocoa to go with you on your journey.  This is quite an emotional game so beware as you play. Without further ado, I present to you... A Dark Winter's Walk. Your host, ℕ𝔹ℂ (𝔾ℍ𝕆𝕊𝕋) Credits: Developed by: Ghost What Child Is This (Dark Piano Version) by: Nicolas Gasparini (Myuu) Sound Effects: Boom Library and Joseph Sardin  Background Photo: Taken and Edited by Ghost

If you want to hear more music from Nicolas Gasparini (myuu) look him up on SoundCloud or his personal website: https://thedarkpiano.com/.
